UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The design of a cell-selective fowlicidin-1-derived peptide with both antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities.
Literature.Author: Rajasekaran G, Kumar SD, Yang S, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=32µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=32µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=16µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=16µM)
